name: Code: Realize ~Bouquet of Rainbows~ Limited Edition
summary: Limited Edition package includes: Two games on one disc - Code Realize: Guardian of Rebirth & Code Realize: Future Blessings Full-color 17” x 24” printed cloth banner featuring the gentlemen of Code Realize Set of nine exclusive 1.5” metal character pins Set of eight collectible 4” x 6” bromide cards with character bios on the back Two games on a single disc - the PS4 release of code: realize contains the first two games of the series.
